news.title: How to use Flashforge 3D Printer?
news.description: Axi Draw in-person workshop is happening at Danforth Technology Building. You will learn how to create drawings with Axi Draw machine. Build your own card for a friend for free!
news.creator: Sabira Duishebaeva

news.title: Get comfortable with Axi Draw
news.description: Learn how to use 3d Dreamforge printers in 2 days! You will be able to create your own 3D figures from the scratch!
news.creator: Sabira Duishebaeva

news.title: Make a card for your friend with FormLab 3D printer
news.description: Create any kind of 3D object from scratch and make a gift for your friend!
news.creator: Sabira Duishebaeva
